title: The Magnus Archives - Season 5 Trailer
itunes:title: The Magnus Archives - Season 5 Trailer
itunes:subtitle: The Archivist and Martin reflect on their current situation...
description:
The Archivist and Martin reflect on their current situation...


The Magnus Archives returns for its final season April 2nd 2020.


NOTE: This season was conceived long prior to the real world pandemic situation of March 2020, with many episodes written before governmental & societal responses. Some early episodes may feel remarkably, and uncomfortably, close to current events, but are the logical extension of and commentary on the events established at the end of Season 4.


Edited by Alexander J Newall.


Performances:

"The Archivist" - Jonathan Sims

"Martin Blackwood" - Alexander J Newall


Sound effects by dheming, Mydo1, m_delaparra, Darsycho, miguelab1998, taure & previously credited artists via freesound.org.

Get bonus content on Patreon

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
